sentences.sContent: He was killed by a single bullet.
a bullet wound in the shoulder
Several bullet holes could be seen beside a window.
sentences.sCn: 窗户边可以看到几个弹孔。

synos.tran: [军]子弹；只选某党全部候选人的投票；豆子

phrases.pCn: 忍痛，咬紧牙关；咬子弹（强忍痛苦）

remMethod.val: bull(芝加哥公牛队) ＋ et → 芝加哥公牛队队员身手敏捷， 如子弹般穿梭在球场中 → 子弹

trans.tranCn: 枪弹， 子弹， 弹丸
trans.tranOther: a small piece of metal that you fire from a gun
